name: square-connect-ts
description: Unofficial TypeScript client for Square Connect API

scripts.clean: rm -Rf node_modules/ *.js             # Delete local development files (without touching the binary outputs in 'dist')
scripts.build: tsc                                   # TypeScript Compiler; Config is automatically read from tsconfig.json
scripts.test: npm run build && node dist/client.js   # This presumes the existence of a 'client.js'. Should probably replace with something that runs Mocha tests

author: OpenAPI-Generator Contributors
